wikipedia_page.main:
Ian Cox (born 24 February 1967) is a former English cricketer.  Cox was a right-handed batsman who bowled right-arm medium pace.  He was born at Heathfield, Sussex.
Cox represented the Sussex Cricket Board in a single List A match against Hertfordshire in the 1999 NatWest Trophy.  In his only List A match, he scored 10 runs.
